name: Legends of Runeterra
description: Downloads and launches the Riot's installer to allow installation of Legends Of Runettera. Dxvk enabled.
notes:
Script starts up the Riot launcher, user is required to login and manage launcher's installation of the Legends Of Runeterra.

- Running the game straight after installation (from the Riot launcher) is buggy and might not work, close it to finish the installation and start the game normally.
- If the game crashes or you have experienced connection error there might be stale processes left (even after closing  the game/lutris,  RiotClientCrash, LoRCrashHandler, ...). These processes might prevent you from starting the game again and have to be force killed.

- Tested on Ubuntu 19.10, nVidia 1060 6G (driver 435.21), lutris-0.5.4.
content:
files:
- launcher_exe: https://bacon.secure.dyn.riotcdn.net/channels/public/x/installer/current/live.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: --launch-product=bacon --launch-patchline=live
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Riot Games/Riot Client/RiotClientServices.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Running launcher.
    executable: launcher_exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
